newsitem.title: USA: RISCORP to delay filing 10-K with SEC.
newsitem.headline: RISCORP to delay filing 10-K with SEC.

text.p: RISCORP Inc said Tuesday it will notify the Securities and Exchange Commission of a delay in filing its Form 10-K.
RISCORP said it plans to file its 10-K and announce its fourth quarter and full year 1996 results upon completion of its final year-end audit.
The company said, however, that it believes both its fourth quarter and full year 1996 results will be profitable.

RISCORP, Inc. is a managed care workers' compensation company offering employers integrated products and services designed to control costs, provide quality medical care, and promote rapid return to work.
